sn23.14:4.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:
sn23.14:4.3: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘naturally impermanent’.
sn23.14:4.5: “Rādha, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are naturally impermanent.
sn23.14:4.7: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
